definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: This is one nutritious spud as it is loaded with vitamin A and vitamin C.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種營養的馬鈴薯富含維生素A和維生素C。

sentences.english: The effects of tea fungus on the browning of fresh-cut potato were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 試驗研究紅茶菌液對鮮切馬鈴薯褐變的影響。

sentences.english: Does the modern world owe its very existence to the humble spud?
sentences.chinese: 現代世界的存在要歸功於微不足道的馬鈴薯？

sentences.english: We had to eat some potatoes substituted as a meal.
sentences.chinese: 我們只得吃了幾個馬鈴薯充飢。

sentences.english: It was, therefore, postulated that it could be a new pathogenesis-related protein gene of the potato.
sentences.chinese: 該基因可能是馬鈴薯一個新的病程相關蛋白基因。

sentences.english: I have to feed the chickens and hoe the potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 我得餵雞，還得爲馬鈴薯鋤草。

sentences.english: We had lamb chops and potatoes for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我們晚餐喫羊肉片和馬鈴薯。

sentences.english: Ricotta cheese in cream sauce with the thinly sliced potato.
sentences.chinese: 馬鈴薯和法式白醬加上口感濃郁的瑞卡達起司。

sentences.english: Mrs. Wu will have the filet mignon with baked potato and Caesar salad.
sentences.chinese: 吳太太要小牛排，加烤馬鈴薯和凱撒沙拉。

sentences.english: The chicken was garnished with watercress and tiny new potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 這隻雞配有西洋菜和新鮮小塊馬鈴薯來裝飾。

sentences.english: Give me chicken croquettes with green peas and cream sauce and mashed potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 給我一分奶油和馬鈴薯糊拌雞肉餅。

sentences.english: The chef mashed some potatoes to go alone with the steak.
sentences.chinese: 主廚做馬鈴薯泥來搭配牛排。

sentences.english: Could I have cauliflower instead of mashed potatoes?
sentences.chinese: 請給我花椰菜而不要馬鈴薯泥可以嗎？

sentences.english: The potatoes browned in the pan.
sentences.chinese: 馬鈴薯在鍋裏被煎成褐色。

sentences.english: Basil came from Italy. Onions came from Europe.
sentences.chinese: 馬鈴薯源於墨西哥，羅勒來自意大利，洋蔥來自歐洲。
